question: Which country hosted the 23rd Conference of Auditors General of Commonwealth Countries and British Overseas Territories?
explanation: The 23rd Conference of Auditors General of Commonwealth Countries and British Overseas Territories has held in New Delhi from 21-23 March, 2017. The conference was attended by 52 commonwealth countries and 9 British overseas territories. The theme of the conference is “Fostering Partnerships for Capacity Development in Public Audit”. This is the first time the prestigious conference is held in India, which is hosted by Comptroller & Auditor General (CAG). The last such conference was held in Malta in 2014.
